name: Edamame Quinoa Salad
description: Cold Asian-inspired vegan salad. Edamame and quinoa provide complete plant-based protein.

instructions.instruction: Cook quinoa in 2 cups water for 18 minutes.
Cool quinoa or rinse with cold water.
Cook edamame according to package directions and cool.
Make dressing: Whisk soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, olive oil, and honey.
In a large bowl, combine quinoa and all vegetables.
Drizzle dressing and toss to combine.
Garnish with sesame seeds and cilantro.

tips: Edamame are young soybeans - complete protein.
Served cold - perfect for summer months.
Great for meal prep - stays fresh for 4 days.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for up to 4 days. Store dressing separately for best freshness.
servingSuggestion: Serve on its own or with grilled tofu.
variations: Add mango cubes for a tropical twist.
Add peanuts for extra crunch and protein.
Add chicken or shrimp for more protein.
